    quick_start

    quick_start.Rmd
    library(myrpkg)
name = "quick start"
qs_value = 42

    Shared.R

    # Hello, a comment
cat("Hello world\n")
#> Hello world

    Child regular

    # this is from a child Rmd
# Here we declare a shared element

childEnv = new.env()

childEnv$name = sprintf("child-%s", rnorm(1))

# what's in parent env ?
    # this will be shown, but not evaluated
stop("This would have thrown an error")

    ** End of child **

    as.list(childEnv)
#> $name
#> [1] "child-0.615435085479735"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] 0.8707684

    Child include=F

    ** End of child **

    as.list(childEnv)
#> $name
#> [1] "child-1.37708507298095"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] -0.2896577

    Self

    childEnv
#> <environment: 0x7ffbec668130>
as.list(childEnv)
#> $name
#> [1] "child-1.37708507298095"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] -0.2896577

childEnv$quick_start = T
as.list(childEnv)
#> $quick_start
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "child-1.37708507298095"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] -0.2896577
